casebody.data:
ALLEN
v.
TRAVELERS INS. CO. No. 236P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. Jimmy L. Allen, Charlotte, for Allen, Jimmy L., et al. Angela M. Allen, Raleigh. James S. Derrick, Charlotte, for Travelers Insurance Company, et al.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of July 2015 by Plaintiffs for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
